name: Trolion
tag_list: artificial-intelligence, location-based-services, mcommerce, business-to-business-services, iphone, android, online-reputation-monitoring
overview:
Trolion is a SaaS applications company, founded in late 2010, which offers an innovative, comprehensive marketing and business intelligence platform serving the consumer and retail marketplace.

Our AI-based web and mobile application, Rush49, connects existing and potential local customers with local businesses, allowing merchants to self-disseminate special offers in an easy-to-use and dynamic environment, as well as monitor customers usage and competitors trends - all in real time and in a completely automated manner.

Trolion aims to become a disruptive and forward thinking player in the emerging field of online local marketing, and ultimately the one-stop marketing and business intelligence option for consumer-facing businesses.
